titleStmt.title: The Free exchanger, or, The Mint for vncurrant coyne according to the true value of graines, wanting in light gold, with the seuerall worth of all pieces of gold, at this present.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iames Bouuler, and are to be sold at the Mary-gold, in Pauls churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
